title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with parmesan.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture off heat.
Serve with extra parmesan and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 2 hours.
Fry onions until soft, add tomato puree and simmer.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
